entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Lazy loading of Related Data with proxies: Query Asynchronously #29333
  • Static entities and cannot be tracked because another instance with the key value '{Id: }' is already being tracked. #29332
  • Referencing EntityFrameworkCore.Design in .NET MAUI Application results in build error #29335
  • More than twenty 'IServiceProvider' instances have been created for internal use by Entity Framework. #29330

Closed

  • Accessing properties of result selected with First/FirstOrDefault #29304
  • Attempting GroupBy navigation property throws internal KeyNotFoundException #29199
    7.0.0
  • Query: Support GroupBy when it is final operator #19929
    7.0.0
  • Add a custom collection interface with an `IsLoaded` property. #29256
  • EF Core automatically creates expensive database when executing migrations #29251
  • `ExecuteUpdate` with `Dictionary<string, object?>` update condition #29247
  • IdentityMap still referenced in StateManager after DbContexts has been returned to DbContextPool #29098
  • FromSqlRaw + OwnedEntity + Where on PK throws #29317
  • Ef Core 7 RC2 NamingConvention get_EntityTypeAddedConventions method not found #29327

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Stabilize versions #29328
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Merged

  • Clean up stored procedure tests as NonSharedModelTestBase #29331
    tell-mode, auto-merge
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #29326
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29325
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
